# Interface: Point

Represents a point on the chart.

## Properties[​](Point.html#properties "Direct link to Properties"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to Properties"} {#properties .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

### x[​](Point.html#x "Direct link to x"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to x"} {#x .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

> `readonly` **x**: [`Coordinate`](../type-aliases/Coordinate.html)

The x coordinate.

------------------------------------------------------------------------

### y[​](Point.html#y "Direct link to y"){.hash-link aria-label="Direct link to y"} {#y .anchor .anchorWithStickyNavbar_LWe7}

> `readonly` **y**: [`Coordinate`](../type-aliases/Coordinate.html)

The y coordinate.
